page.title: 07PIRELLI
page.content: In each twenty four hour day they turn out approximatley ten thousand tyres which are bought by nearly all the major car companies in the world. Many diffrent tyres are made most to fit ordinary family cars but some for very exotic sports cars such as those made by the German company Porsche.In fact over 60% of all the tyres made in Carlisle are destined for export to other countries such as Sweden or Japan.The company has a very active social club which is widely used by people in the area as the membership is open to anyone who lives in the area. It is seen as an important socail asset by many people.
